song.title: Digital World
song.info:
(FEBRUARY 2006)
This is *NOT* AY! This is a chiptune with sound-quality of ONE BIT (sound turn-on, sound turn-off, nothing more). Generated by Z80 chip with ULA chip as a transducer.
Author's note: "Believe or not: real ONE BIT SAMPLES, real digital music from BEEPER!!! MOD for BEEPER? Almost. :) You can find here 3 digital channels of 1-bit music. Program SAMPLE-TRACKER requires only 48Kb of RAM and... BEEPER of course. :) So you can make MOD-like songs for your hardcore configuration!!! ;) Hardware: Timex Computer 48Kb of course."
http://mister_beep.republika.pl/music.html
